thread.title: Maureen
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Maureen

author: Maureen
title: Maureen
text: Excellent customer service- advisor sent me exact measurements and the jacket arrived quickly and fitted perfectly. I would recommend this company to anyone and would certainly use them again.
